content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator near (-9.5, -0.5)
This structure generates initial power for the factory. It consists of core components:
*   Offshore Pump at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
*   Boiler at (x=-3.0, y=1.5)
*   Steam Engine at (x=5.5, y=4.5)
*   Inserter at (x=-0.5, y=1.5) for feeding coal into the Boiler (currently waiting for source items).
*   Associated pipes (PipeGroup starting at x=-8.5 y=-0.5 for water, PipeGroup starting at x=-4.5 y=1.5 for steam) and electric poles (part of ElectricityGroup id=70885) connecting the components and linking to the main grid.

### Coal Mining and Feed for Chemical Plant at (17.5, 1.5)
